name: run_service
description: Run a rust binary against a Kubernetes service using mirrord to mirror traffic

code.description: Complete rust code using only reqwest::blocking::get, serde::Deserialize, serde_json, and anyhow::Result. The resulting binary is run against the cluster.

mirrord_config.description: JSON string for mirrord configuration, e.g., '{"feature": {"network": {"incoming": {"mode": "mirror", "ports": [ 8888 ] } } }'.
